{"id":1522687934,"question_id":2764,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 week, 3 days","timestamp":1738024267,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"24 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1522687934/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Maximum Number of Fish in a Grid","memory":"110.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int findMaxFish(vector<vector<int>>& grid) {\n        //0: land\n        int ret = 0;\n        int m = grid.size();\n        int n = grid[0].size();\n        //cout << \"m: \" << m << \" n: \" << n << endl;\n        vector<pair<int,int>> directions = {{0, 1}, {0, -1}, {1, 0}, {-1, 0}};\n        vector<vector<bool>> visited(m, vector<bool>(n, false));\n        for(int i=0; i<m; i++) {\n            for(int j=0; j<n; j++) {\n                if(grid[i][j]==0 || visited[i][j])\n                    continue;\n                int fish = 0;\n                queue<pair<int,int>> q;\n                visited[i][j] = true;\n                q.push({i, j});\n                while(!q.empty()) {\n                    int curi = q.front().first;\n                    int curj = q.front().second;\n                    fish += grid[curi][curj];\n                    q.pop(); \n                    for(auto dir: directions) {\n                        int newi = curi + dir.first;\n                        int newj = curj + dir.second;\n                        //cout << \"newi: \"<< newi << endl;\n                        //cout << \"newj: \"<< newj << endl;\n                        if(newi<0 || newi>=m || newj<0 || newj >= n || grid[newi][newj]==0 || visited[newi][newj])\n                            continue;\n                        q.push({newi, newj});\n                        visited[newi][newj] = true;\n                    }\n                }\n                ret = max(ret, fish);\n            }\n        }\n        return ret;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"maximum-number-of-fish-in-a-grid","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
